paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have between 20 and 40 years of experience in their respective practice areas.

detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: Clients work directly with their attorney, instead of through layers of assistants or associates.

detailsData.title: Community Involvement
detailsData.content: Known for leadership roles in professional organizations and community involvement.

address: 160 West Santa Clara Street, Suite 625, San Jose, CA 95113
subHeading: San Jose/Silicon Valley Employment, Business & Real Estate Law Firm
valueProp: McPharlin Sprinkles & Thomas LLP is a San Jose employment, business and real estate law firm that combines the quality found in large firms with the personal service and economy of a smaller, specialized firm.
CTA: You only get experience here – and experience gets you results

testimonalData.text: The attorneys at McPharlin Sprinkles & Thomas are exceptional. They provided me with expert legal advice and helped me navigate complex business issues.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend McPharlin Sprinkles & Thomas for their professionalism and dedication to achieving the best outcomes for their clients.

testimonalData.text: Working with McPharlin Sprinkles & Thomas was a great experience. Their knowledge and expertise in real estate law helped me secure a successful transaction.
